text: allah kavurun hata rju margaya penvimata adahas karanneda, ohuge hrdaya islamaya desata (yamata) ohu vistiranaya kara harinneya. kavurunva (ohuge) durmargayema athÃ¦ra damannata adahas karanneda, ohuge hrdaya (bala kirimakin) ahasata naginnekuge (hrdaya) men itamat amaruven hakuluva yana bavata pat kara harinneya. mese visvasa nokala ayata allah danduvam laba denneya
